page.title: 19COMMUNITY FACILITIES.
page.content: {WRENBURY _}Mother and Baby Group. Toddler Group. Play Group. Brownies. Cubs. Guides. Youth Club. Gardening Club. Women's Institute. Over 60's Club. Mother's Union. Wednesday Club (non _ denominational for ladies). Luncheon Club for senior citizens. British Legion. A new pavilion and playing field providing tennis courts,bowling green, football pitch and a clay pigeon shooting area. Children's play area providing fixed equipment. A Primary School with a Parents Association. A Church Hall available for hire. {MARBURY _}Youth Club. Mother's Union. Women's Institute. A children's play area with fixed equipment. A Primary School. A Village Hall available for hire.
